channel.title: ESP3D :: ESP3D Ecosystem
channel.description: What is ESP3D ? ESP3D is a firmware for ESP8266 and ESP32 boards from espressif, This firmware allows not only to have a cheap bridge between Wifi and serial, but also to have a web UI to configure wifi, to monitor 3D printer/CNC and even control it, and to make things easy, UI is fully customizable without reflashing FW. Firmware support different target firmwares according version. The firmware use arduino framework and platformio system

item.title: Version 2.1.X
item.description: This version is the production version, features are frozen, only bugfixes are accepted. Firmware should work with the following firmwares: Repetier 1.0 Marlin 1.X/2.X Smoothieware 1.x grbl 1.x The communication between ESP board and target board is done by serial. The firmware must be used with ESP3D-WEBUI 2.X

item.title: Version 3.X
item.description: This version is the development version, features can change anytime, feedback, PR and suggestions are welcome. Firmware should work with the following firmwares: Repetier 1.0 Marlin 1.X/2.X Smoothieware 1.x grbl 1.x The communication between ESP board and target board is done by serial. The firmware must be used with ESP3D-WEBUI 3.X To help and simplify the configuration, a configurator is available:
